params.name: do_convert_rgb
params.description: Whether to convert the image to RGB.

params.name: do_normalize
params.description: Whether to normalize the image. Can be overridden by the do_normalize parameter in the preprocessmethod. According to Pix2Struct paper and code, the image is normalized with its own mean and standarddeviation.

params.name: max_patches
params.description: The maximum number of patches to extract from the image as per the Pix2Structpaper.

params.name: is_vqa
params.description: Whether or not the image processor is for the VQA task. If True and header_text is passed in, text isrendered onto the input images.
